Description:
Space And A Location To Love
If you are over 55 and looking to downsize and still be close to all the conveniences that Emerald has to offer including cafes, shops, medical practitioners, public transport, Art Society, Community House and Emerald Lake Park, then this is the ideal home for you. Located in the popular Chestnuts Gardens this one bedroom unit has the largest block in the village.
This home includes a large bedroom with built in robes and is serviced by the main bathroom. Featuring a spacious lounge and meals area adjoining the gallery kitchen you will be able to enjoy preparing meals while looking onto your garden outside. Large windows allow plenty of natural light to filter through this home and provides views to the established north facing garden beds at the front. High secure fences ensure your privacy where you can relax outside with your furry friend or tend to your garden or veggie patch. The home has slab heating for comfort all year round, security entrance door, single lock up garage & secure access from the garage into the home.
This home will provide you with the opportunity to enjoy life doing the things that are important to you without the work of a property that has become too large. Also a great investment opportunity (rental for 55yo +). To arrange an inspection at your convenience, call today.
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!
Aaron Day 0407 365 994
Please note: All property details shown are correct at time of publishing. Some properties may have been sold in the preceding 24 hours and we recommend that you confirm open for inspection times with the listing agent direct or the listing office
Insights: 6/11 Westlands Road, Emerald VIC 3782 was last sold in 2019.

Description:
Spacious One Bedroom in a Boutique Block
***Please register your interest in this property so that we can ensure you are included in the Virtual Auction and/or contacted in the event the property is going to be sold prior to the Virtual Auction 27th October at 6pm***
***Please contact us via email or phone to speak about your options to privately inspect this property. Thank you.***
This gorgeous second floor apartment in the creative hub of the Colngwood arts precinct offers a secure, light filled space with over-the-rooftop views to the east. For the discerning owner or investor who appreciates top quality design and Japanese-inspired simplicity, this cleverly designed space has exactly what you need in one tidy, sustainably-minded package.
Featuring a tranquil balcony and a flexible floorplan with secure off-street parking and ample storage - all just a stone's throw away from Collingwood's hippest locations and conveniences.
This stylish gem is a must see!
*** COVID-19 Announcement ***
If you're attending a Private Appointment, we request that you only attend if you are fit and healthy to do so and not under any self-isolation conditions. We request that you maintain a healthy distance from our team and refrain from touching any items/fixtures and doors within the property. You must wear a face mask and we will provide gloves for your appointment. If you would like to view something in particular, please request the agent's assistance. Thank you.
Insights: First listed on 5 October, this unit has been on Domain for 15 days (last updated on 5 October). It was last sold in 2017 and 49 other 1 bedroom unit in Collingwood have recently been sold.

Description:
Landmark brew tower luxury - entire level with views
Spanning the entire 5th-floor of the historic Yorkshire Brewery tower c1876, this brilliant apartment conversion presents a landmark lifestyle opportunity with 360-degree views. Once a beacon for colonial Melburnians and the largest of its kind in Victoria, the architecturally significant brew tower with its evocative French Second Empire mansard roof has undergone a total renovation (it's now even earthquake proof!) and reveals a first-time offered opportunity with this superbly-crafted contemporary apartment. Lift access to the exclusive 5th-floor precedes a perfectly-designed, practical interior instilled with outstanding modern style and superior-quality features and finishes while retaining its rich original spirit with high 3.8m ceilings, thick exposed brick walls and double-glazed arched windows. Adjoining a covered alfresco terrace, the open-plan living and dining area incorporates a stunning Miele-equipped marble kitchen leading to 2 sizable bedrooms with built-in robes, beautiful bathroom and a laundry. There's also linear ducted heating/cooling, video intercom, wool carpets, dark oak floors plus on-title basement car space and private storage cage. The rejuvenated brewery precinct is bubbling with life and located close to Gertrude and Smith Streets' shops and eateries, trams, Fitzroy Gardens, East Melbourne hospitals, MCG and the city.
Insights: 501A/2 Mansard Lane, Collingwood VIC 3066 was last sold in 2020 and 83 other 2 bedroom unit in Collingwood have recently been sold.

Description:
DUAL FACING APARTMENT IN COLLINGWOOD!
Cambridge & Langridge, C&L, introduces residents to a new layer of Collingwood living, bringing together Collingwoods architectural heritage, with the best of todays contemporary creativity in design innovation, engineering and construction. At ground level, 270 degrees of retail spaces, including the new Eat Street laneway, provide added depth and activation to the street scape.
The building itself has fantastic aspects, amazing city views and safe views to the North. With only 35 units in the block each with stone bench-tops, quality 2Pac joinery, high end SMEG appliances, Fisher & Paykel white goods, a concealed split system heating/cooling and floor to ceiling double glazed windows - C&L Residences is not to be missed!
Along with C&L having the highest energy rating in Collingwood and on grade parking and storage for ALL units you will have the ability to customise and merge/create personalised spaces!
Apartment 704 features:
- North/East facing
- Clear safe views to the North
- B&O speaker packages
- Functional butlers pantry
- Separate laundry
- 3 bedrooms with BIRs
- Master bedroom with ensuite
- Basement storage
- Dual aspect apartment
Designed by the award winning CHT Architects and currently being built by Hamilton Marino.
Please contact Emily Shaddick on 0409 864 551 or Daniel Retman on 0401 504 432 for more information!
Internal area
110mÂ²

Description:
If you love Collingwood, youll love 107Cambridge!
107 Cambridge, a luxury offering inspired by New York's infamous meat-packing district. A bouquet apartment complex designed by the ever-talented Elenberg Fraser and brought to life by prominent property developer Gurner. 107 Cambridge St is one of the last remaining developments to be completed within the historic 'Foy and Gibson' precinct.
This 2-bedroom/1-bathroom apartment has finishes you would only find in a one-off bespoke custom build.
Apartments feature:
Beautiful open and light filled living areas and kitchen
Kitchen and bathroom equipped with metallic and bronze tapware
Gas burner cooktops and stainless steel appliances
Spacious bedrooms
Built-in wardrobes with mirror sliding doors
Wooden floorboards throughout living with shade privacy blinds
Plush carpet in the bedrooms with blackout blinds
Spacious balcony
Beyond the apartment space, the ground floor retail space is occupied by Project49, a delicious cafÃ© at your doorstep.
Only a short walk to the popular Smith Street.
Insights: 208/107 Cambridge Street, Collingwood VIC 3066 was last sold in 2015 and 83 other 2 bedroom unit in Collingwood have recently been sold.

Description:
Expressions of Interest - Closing 27 August, 2020 at 6pm
*Due to Melbourne's Stage 4 Restrictions, all Nelson Alexander team members are working from home. Please contact us via email or phone to speak about your options to view this property virtually. Thank you.*
RARE COLLINGWOOD WAREHOUSE CONVERSION WITH EXCITING POSSIBILITIES.
Privately tucked away in Collingwood's urban heartland, this rare warehouse conversion captures the ultimate in cosmopolitan inner city cool with endless possibilities for an extensive rebuild. Embracing its raw industrial heritage, interiors are complemented by unique spatial variances synonymous with warehouse living, eclectic style and rooftop deck. Boasting double height ceilings with steel beams, exposed brick walls and timber floors, the ground level incorporates a generous living and dining area, drenched in light through original windows, plus a smart gas kitchen with stainless steel Bosch fixtures, Rinnai heater, large utility room (pantry/small bedroom/study) with integrated storage, large bathroom, laundry facilities and retro accents. Upstairs is a marvellous mezzanine level with limitless options for bedrooms, additional living zones flowing to the rooftop deck. Roller-door garage parking with internal access completes this amazing opportunity to acquire one of the few remaining original Collingwood warehouses. Ideally placed strolling distance to Smith Street's vibrant cafes, award winning restaurants and retail shops.
It's Mixed-Use zone allows for a multitude of possible uses. Whether you are an architect or developer looking for an exciting project or simply a first home buyer looking for that lifestyle always dreamt of, just don't miss it!
Insights: 4 Napoleon Street, Collingwood VIC 3066 was last sold in 2020 and 29 other 2 bedroom house in Collingwood have recently been sold.

Description:
A stunning fusion of designer luxe & sumptuous style
Contemporary innovation honouring its iconic Foy & Gibson position is reflected throughout this brilliant apartment with its warehouse-like volume and beautiful bespoke features. Set beyond a striking modern profile and Chesterfield filled lobby with lift, this secure north-facing apartment is a stunning mix of style, sophistication and light-filled space created by Elenberg Fraser architects and Gurner developments. Shining brass accents, sleek stone finishes and chic design elements are showcased throughout the high-ceiling interior with its large double-glazed windows capturing natural light and supreme quality appointments adding a luxurious edge. Dedicated to gourmet pleasures, the Ilve-equipped kitchen features a cocktail cabinet and dining benchtop while the adjoining living room opens to an extra-spacious covered balcony with bar bench and historic Foy & Gibson outlook. There are 2 smart bedrooms with mirror built-in robes including the main with beautiful ensuite, plus a designer bathroom, European laundry, heating/cooling, video intercom, oak floors and a basement car space with storage cage on title. This exceptional modern apartment in Melbourne's premier warehouse precinct is all about lifestyle with cafes at the doorstep and the cultural buzz of Smith & Brunswick Streets just nearby.
Insights: 405/107 Cambridge Street, Collingwood VIC 3066 was last sold in 2020 and 83 other 2 bedroom unit in Collingwood have recently been sold.

Description:
Captivating Victorian Terrace
**Inspections by Private Appointment**
Retaining romantic appeal, the residence showcases an enviable position, epitomising the inner northern lifestyle.
Immaculate presentation throughout, the impressive home boasts 2 elegant bedrooms with built in robes, inviting living room with gas-coal fireplace, kitchen/meals with stainless steel Bellini dishwasher and bathed in natural light.
Combining traditional period charm, typical of the era and Eco friendly upgrades like solar panel energy, LED lighting and water saving fittings.
The property features a central bathroom with double shower, euro style laundry, split system heating/cooling and favourable North facing courtyard/garden.
Located in arguably one of Collingwoods finest residential streets, within close proximity to popular gastro pubs, artisanal boutiques, vibrant nightlife, cafes, restaurants, public transport options and Yarra River bikes trails.
Current Covid-19 Notice
https://www.vic.gov.au/coronavirus-covid-19-restrictions-victoria

Description:
Contemporary class in cosmopolitan surrounds
Suave, Sassy and Sophisticated, this 2-bedroom plus study apartment at Collingwood's effervescent heart delivers Melbourne's best inner-city living experience. With the mouth-watering Proud Mary cafe at its doorstep, and metres from Smith St's alluring eateries and city-bound trams, the home offers a vivacious, low-maintenance lifestyle. Featuring bold, black hardwood floors, the spacious layout indulges relaxation and entertaining in air-conditioned comfort, effortlessly served by a sleek stone kitchen with ample storage and European appliances. Each double bedroom is pampered with mirrored robes, including his-and-her robes and a chic ensuite to the main, while the guest bathroom includes a Euro laundry. Complete with a dedicated office to close away the workday, plus basement parking and tons of storage, the home offers a priceless lifestyle, enriched by a residents' barbecue garden and plunge-pool.
Insights: 604/50 Stanley Street, Collingwood VIC 3066 was last sold in 2020 and 83 other 2 bedroom unit in Collingwood have recently been sold.

Description:
OVERSIZED, 3 BEDROOM TOWN RESIDENCE
**INSPECT STRICTLY BY APPOINTMENT ONLY. PLEASE CONTACT AGENT FOR TIME**
Open the doors to this low maintenance, updated townhouse.
Located in the dynamic inner-city pocket of Collingwood, opportunity is knocking
- 3 upstairs bedrooms, master with built in robe & balcony terrace
- Dual access bathroom with bath, walk in shower, separate toilet with vanity, powder room & separate laundry
- Unexpectedly spacious living & sitting/retreat area
- Gourmet sized kitchen, Westinghouse oven/gas cooktop, dishwasher & naturally light filled dining area
- North-facing paved, private & tranquil rear courtyard
- Remote roller door access to secure carport/main entrance
Enjoy the benefits of a secure lock up & leave lifestyle amidst all the inner-city action with Johnston Street shops, cafes & public transport options to the CBD only metres away.
Conditions of entry - IDENTIFICATION and contact number required, otherwise entry may be refused.
The information about this property has been supplied to us by the property owner, while we have no cause to doubt its accuracy, we provide no guarantee. We cannot attest to the functionality of any fixtures, fittings or inclusions to the property. Land and apartment dimensions and floor/site plans are supplied by third parties. Typing mistakes, omissions, transposing can occur, we provide to assist but make no representation. Buyers must carry out their own due diligence.
Insights: 132 Perry Street, Collingwood VIC 3066 was last sold in 2020 and 24 other 3 bedroom house in Collingwood have recently been sold.

Description:
When extra space matters! Renovated with flair on deep land
Please register your interest in this property so that we can ensure you are included in the Virtual Auction and/or contacted in the event the property is going to be sold prior to the Virtual Auction 25 July at 12:30pm
*** This property is available for inspection by appointment - Please contact us to arrange a suitable time ***
This semi-detached Victorian terrace, set behind a walled courtyard, offers spacious light-filled living close to vibrant Collingwood cafes, public transport and freeway access. Opening to a fretwork-trimmed hall, it comprises three double bedrooms, a central living/dining room, well-equipped kitchen (quality appliances, pantry) and stylish bathroom/laundry. With potential to extend (STCA) on a deep block with secluded north-facing garden, this appealing home features open fireplaces and other period detail, polished Baltic floors and split-system air conditioning throughout.
*** COVID-19 ANNOUNCEMENT ***
If you're attending a Private Appointment, we request that you only attend if you are fit and healthy to do so and not under any self-isolation conditions. We request that you maintain a healthy distance from our team members, and if requested wait outside until the property is ready for the appointment. Lastly, please refrain from touching items/fixtures and doors within the properties. If you would like to view something in particular, please request the agent's assistance. Thank you.

Description:
Chic style and sunlit space in trendy surrounds
A stylish fusion of the area's modest warehouse origins with chic, modern flair, this 2-bedroom apartment delivers an uplifting setting for prime, inner-city living. In a boutique complex of only 40 homes with Proud Mary cafe and Moon Wine Bar at its door, the home indulges lifestyle, paces from Smith and Brunswick St's eclectic eateries, the CBD's shopping, and city-bound trams. The sunlit interior is contrasted in chic blacks and whites, framed by bold Oak floors and high concrete ceilings. The vast layout affords room to relax and dine, extending to a north-facing balcony for indoor-outdoor entertaining, while a full-sized Ilve kitchen hosts guests over a stone breakfast bar, offering abundant customised storage. With mirrored robes to each bedroom and a stylishly dressed bathroom, the home is completed by a Euro laundry, secure parking and storage cage, video intercom, and lift access.
Insights: 304/28 Stanley Street, Collingwood VIC 3066 was last sold in 2020 and 83 other 2 bedroom unit in Collingwood have recently been sold.

Please register your interest in this property so that we can ensure you are included in the Virtual Auction and/or contacted in the event the property is going to be sold prior to the Virtual Auction Saturday 18 July at 10:30am.
***This property is available for inspection by Private Appointment - Please contact us to arrange a suitable time***
Set to the rear of one of Collingwood's smartest new developments, this quiet and spacious apartment is a perfect city residence in the heart of the Smith Street cafe precinct, with the 86 tram outside. With the special appeal of a large return terrace offering sensational CBD and eastern views, and a shared rooftop al fresco entertaining area, this immaculate residence comprises two double bedrooms (BIRs, one with ensuite) plus study zone, a generous living/dining room open to a well-equipped kitchen (premium appliances) and terrace, sleek main bathroom and euro laundry. Including secure basement parking, storage cage and lift entry, this light-flooded property features split-system air conditioning, timber floors and superior appointments.

Description:
Oasis of contemporary cool
Designer luxury all the way, this three bedroom two bathroom architecturally enhanced residence is a showcase of contemporary cool. A serene haven in the vibrant inner-city, this striking home with landscaped minimal maintenance gardens and entrance deck takes inner city living to the next level. Two sunlit living domains highlight a stunning gourmet Ilve kitchen with marble counters and walk-in pantry. Oak floors, vertical gardens in a light well, and custom lighting add class to this home, cleverly designed to maximise its living spaces. Bedrooms are serviced by fully tiled bathrooms with walk-in showers, master with ensuite, while heating/cooling, secure entry, double glazing plus a car space complete this home, a short stroll to Smith Street trams and cafes, schools, parks and CBD.

Description:
Cambridge Court - circa 1920s
** Register to attend an open for inspection **
In order to maintain a maximum of 20 attendees to all Open Inspections, we ask that you please register to attend by clicking the book inspection. By registering your details, you avoid disappointment if more than 20 people attend the inspection and will assist us in keeping the inspections as safe as possible for our team and our clients.
Historic former nurses quarters within classic solid brick heritage building now provides first grade student accommodation with healthy rental returns. Superbly positioned adjacent cosmopolitan Smith Street and enjoying close proximity to many iconic Melbourne landmarks and the CBD, a rental return of approx. 7% clearly beats anything your bank may be offering. Comprising relatively generous open plan living with well equipped kitchen, separate bedroom, and ensuite bathroom. A high return investment in a proven capital growth location.

Description:
Landmark warehouse living with city-view rooftop terrace
Magnificent polished timber ceilings soar 8.5 metres above the light and airy living spaces of this expansive, 4 bedroom residence rising with captivating effect to an amazing city-view rooftop terrace. Distinctive and dramatic displaying all of the iconic character of its Foy & Gibson heritage (1900), this stunning conversion curated over 3 levels layered with an endless list of superlatives presents a remarkably rare lifestyle experience in Melbourne's most sought-after warehouse apartment precinct. Visionary in its outlook, brilliant in its execution; the beauty of this unique city-edge opportunity is not only its historic aesthetics and modern style, but its extraordinary space and versatility offering in excess of 38 squares of light-filled luxury. Under the artisan-crafted, oregon beam ceiling is an impressive open-plan living and dining zone (HeatnGlo gas fireplace, entertainment unit) complemented by a relaxing library, cafe/bar (dual fridges) and spacious separate office/4th bedroom plus a top-floor lantern lounge/retreat opening to the sun-drenched alfresco terrace. A superb exemplar of warehouse living with its big open spaces and spectacular lofty heights, this beautifully finished home features main bedroom with WIR and double-shower bathroom, Miele-appointed kitchen with stainless-steel and timber benchtops, sophisticated contemporary bath and powder rooms, large fitted laundry, cellar/storage, hydronic heating, split-system air-conditioning, alarm, intercom, zoned speaker system, automatic retractable awnings, original Baltic pine floors, wool carpets and storage cupboard plus 2 car spaces on title. Centrally located in the heart of Collingwood near all that makes inner-city living so exciting; walk to an endless selection of excellent restaurants, cafes, shops and trams on nearby Smith/Gertrude/Brunswick Streets, elegant parks and gardens, city-fringe hospitals, Melbourne's sports' precinct and the city.
Insights: 14/79 Oxford Street, Collingwood VIC 3066 was last sold in 2007.

Description:
RENOVATED LIFESTYLE APARTMENT IN BOUTIQUE BLOCK
Comfort and charm are on offer here with this fully renovated top floor apartment on the fringe of the Melbourne CBD.
- 1 large bedroom with built in robes
- Oversized living room
- Renovated kitchen with washing machine
- Well-appointed bathroom
- Polished timber floors
- Secure off-street parking
- Split system reverse cycle heating/cooling and instantaneous hot water
This tastefully renovated apartment nestled quietly in a 1970s built block presents both comfort and convenience. Only moments from the Melbourne CBD, main travel routes, parks and shops. Purchase as an investment or a primary residence...You win either way.
Conditions of entry - IDENTIFICATION and contact number required, otherwise entry may be refused.
The information about this property has been supplied to us by the property owner, while we have no cause to doubt its accuracy, we provide no guarantee. We cannot attest to the functionality of any fixtures, fittings or inclusions to the property. Land and apartment dimensions and floor/site plans are supplied by third parties. Typing mistakes, omissions, transposing can occur, we provide to assist but make no representation. Buyers must carry out their own due diligence.
Insights: 9/122 Sackville Street, Collingwood VIC 3066 was last sold in 2020 and 49 other 1 bedroom unit in Collingwood have recently been sold.
